ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode

TOKEN.description: The telegram bot token that you get from @BotFather.

SUDO_USERS.description: The telegram bot which works on this owners

LOG_GROUP.description: A group ID to send messages to when a song starts playing, Just keep it like this if you are not going to use one.

LANG.description: Choose the preferred language for your bot. If English leave as it is, or change to the code of any supported language.

DUR_LIMIT.description: Max video duration allowed for downloads in minutes.

API_ID.description: This is to authenticate to your telegram account for downloading Telegram files. You can get this from https://my.telegram.org DO NOT put this in quotes.

API_HASH.description: This is to authenticate to your telegram account for downloading Telegram files. You can get this from https://my.telegram.org.
